description.sun-moon:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
description.sword-shield:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
